casebody.data:
Tracy Powell TOOMER, Andrea Powell Keefe and Erica Renee Clark
v.
BRANCH BANKING AND TRUST COMPANY, as Trustee under the Will of Joan Brown Williamson and as successor-by-merger to United Carolina Bank, as Executor of the Estate of Joan Brown Williamson and Trustee under the Will of Joan Brown Williamson. No. 391P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Peter F. Morgan, L. Holmes Eleazer, Jr., Charlotte, for Tracy Powell Toomer, et al. Andrew K. McVey, W. Berry Trice, Wilmington, for BB&T, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 26th day of July 2005 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of October 2005."
